Title: Kirks Folly Pipe Dream Bubble Fairy Set And Fairy Godmother Set Brooch/Earrings
Description: Up for bids is a beautiful brooch that consist of a fairy in green enamel sitting on a gold crescent moon. He is blowing iridescent bubbles flowing up to the top that vary in size. Dangling from the moon are small moons and stars with crystals and aurora borealis beads. The pin is approx. 2 3/8" and approx. 4 inches long. No scuffs on Moon. The brooch is signed Kirks Folly on the back the the closure is a rollover. The matching earrings are just as beautiful and they are for pierced ears. The consist of bubbles dangling down and from them you have beads dangling with tiny stars and the center hanging one larger star with crystals. "Kirks Folly...Beautiful signed CLASSIC/VINTAGE/SIGNED/NAMED..."FAIRY GODMOTHER" brooch. This is an amazing brooch from Kirks Folly! Sparkle, yes it has sparkle! Wonderfully detailed with the sparkling crystals in her wings (front one & rear one) with The Fairy Godmother holding her crystal ball and with her other hand, she is holding a few stars and her scepter. It's very lovely with the Aurora Borealis rhinestones. It measures 3-1/2" by 2-1/4". She is signed on the back with the Kirks Folly logo & named on the banner above her head and she will be a "wonderful" addition to your KF collection OR a terrific piece to give to a loved one! Kirks Folly collectors know that the value of all their pieces will now increase in value! It is truly a wonderful piece." It will arrive with matching earrings that are pierced and as beautiful as the brooch. So you will have two beautiful sets that are two of the most popular brooches sold. The earrings are a little harder to come by. Thank you for your interest !
